comments:
1. Import the attached profiling file. 
   1.1. Change the Range to "Show full data".
   1.2. Change the Filter to "No Filter".
   1.3. Click Finish. When prompted, open the Profiling Perspective.
2. Expand the tree in the Profiling Monitor Navigator, double-click on "Basic
Memory Analysis". You'll see an error message and some stack traces in the log.
(Stack traces are copied at the end of this defect.) 
3. Double-click "Execution Time Analysis" or "Method Code Coverage" and you'll
see the same error. 

None of the three views open. 

There are two stack traces below:

email it to Eugene instead.

and build tptp.runtime-TPTP-4.1.0-200508231420 should contain the fix.
